name: Pong's Journey
description:
• Use WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump 
  • R to reset the level if it is needed

This game was made in less than 1 week for Brackeys' Game Jam. 
It is about Pong's Adventure to come back to his home
All assets used are not original and are from Unity Assets or Pixabay 
The game design and development was made by ginocarlo01

If you have any suggestions, please leave a comment below
